alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 02 at 1:31AM PST until January 04 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible, except up to 18 inches over the higher mountains. Wind gusts to 30 mph in Baker County, Oregon, and in west-central Idaho, and up to 50 mph in southeast Oregon and Idaho near the Nevada border will cause blowing and drifting of snow. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Oregon and southwest and west central Idaho. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause blowing and drifting of snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County
